query: SELECT ls.slotType, LEFT(ls.title, 50) as title, LENGTH(ls.content) as contentLen FROM cms_lesson_slots ls JOIN cms_lessons l ON ls.lessonId = l.id WHERE l.lessonNumber = '1.1' AND l.moduleId IN (SELECT id FROM cms_modules WHERE pathId IN (SELECT id FROM cms_paths WHERE programId = (SELECT id FROM cms_programs WHERE slug = 'esl'))) ORDER BY ls.sortOrder;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user cYPAHDVF1MZtM6S.caf383761fdf --database Rc5qDPWJcsCQwb6WK47Ybr --execute SELECT ls.slotType, LEFT(ls.title, 50) as title, LENGTH(ls.content) as contentLen FROM cms_lesson_slots ls JOIN cms_lessons l ON ls.lessonId = l.id WHERE l.lessonNumber = '1.1' AND l.moduleId IN (SELECT id FROM cms_modules WHERE pathId IN (SELECT id FROM cms_paths WHERE programId = (SELECT id FROM cms_programs WHERE slug = 'esl'))) ORDER BY ls.sortOrder;

rows.title: The Art of the First Impression
